truth: -  "Analytical chemistry is the science of obtaining, processing, and communicating information about the composition and structure of matter."
fiction: -  "Analytical chemistry is the science of obtaining, processing, and communicating information about the musical composition and structure of matter."

truth: -  "In analytical chemistry, qualitative analysis determines the presence or absence of particular chemical compounds."
fiction: -  "In analytical chemistry, qualitative analysis determines the presence or absence of particular musical notes."

truth: -  "Quantitative analysis in analytical chemistry determines the exact amount of a particular substance in a sample."
fiction: -  "Quantitative analysis in analytical chemistry determines the exact amount of a particular emotion in a sample."

truth: -  "Spectroscopy is a common technique in analytical chemistry used to measure the interaction of light with matter."
fiction: -  "Spectroscopy is a common technique in analytical chemistry used to measure the interaction of light with ghosts."

truth: -  "Chromatography is a method used in analytical chemistry to separate the components of a mixture."
fiction: -  "Chromatography is a method used in analytical chemistry to separate the components of a rainbow."

truth: -  "Mass spectrometry is a technique in analytical chemistry that helps identify the amount and type of chemicals present in a sample."
fiction: -  "Mass spectrometry is a technique in analytical chemistry that helps identify the amount and type of dreams present in a sample."

truth: -  "Titration is a common method in analytical chemistry used to determine the concentration of an identified analyte."
fiction: -  "Titration is a common method in analytical chemistry used to determine the concentration of an identified unicorn."

truth: -  "In analytical chemistry, a reagent is a substance or compound added to a system to cause a chemical reaction."
fiction: -  "In analytical chemistry, a reagent is a substance or compound added to a system to cause a dance party."

truth: -  "Analytical chemistry uses instruments and methods to separate, identify, and quantify matter."
fiction: -  "Analytical chemistry uses instruments and methods to separate, identify, and quantify fairy dust."

truth: -  "In analytical chemistry, pH is a measure of the acidity or basicity of an aqueous solution."
fiction: -  "In analytical chemistry, pH is a measure of the happiness or sadness of an aqueous solution."

truth: -  "Gravimetric analysis, a method in analytical chemistry, involves the measurement of mass."
fiction: -  "Gravimetric analysis, a method in analytical chemistry, involves the measurement of happiness."

truth: -  "Electrochemistry is a branch of analytical chemistry that studies the movement of electrons."
fiction: -  "Electrochemistry is a branch of analytical chemistry that studies the movement of dancers."

truth: -  "In analytical chemistry, a mole is a unit of measurement used to express amounts of a chemical substance."
fiction: -  "In analytical chemistry, a mole is a unit of measurement used to express amounts of a chocolate substance."

truth: -  "Analytical chemistry plays a crucial role in quality control in various industries."
fiction: -  "Analytical chemistry plays a crucial role in controlling the quality of various dance moves."

truth: -  "Infrared spectroscopy is a technique used in analytical chemistry to identify certain molecules."
fiction: -  "Infrared spectroscopy is a technique used in analytical chemistry to identify certain moods."

truth: -  "Analytical chemistry can be used in forensics to identify substance composition in crime scene samples."
fiction: -  "Analytical chemistry can be used in forensics to identify the favorite color of crime scene samples."

truth: -  "In analytical chemistry, an analyte refers to the substance or chemical constituent that is of interest in a chemical analysis."
fiction: -  "In analytical chemistry, an analyte refers to the substance or magical creature that is of interest in a chemical analysis."

truth: -  "Atomic absorption spectroscopy is a technique in analytical chemistry used to determine the concentration of a specific element in a sample."
fiction: -  "Atomic absorption spectroscopy is a technique in analytical chemistry used to determine the concentration of a specific emotion in a sample."

truth: -  "In analytical chemistry, a solvent is a substance that dissolves a solute, resulting in a solution."
fiction: -  "In analytical chemistry, a solvent is a substance that dissolves a song, resulting in a melody."

truth: -  "Analytical chemistry involves two main types of analysis: qualitative and quantitative."
fiction: -  "Analytical chemistry involves two main types of analysis: musical and artistic."
